flawed_nl_solution:
The ones with nuts that they ate was 40% of the box because 80% x 0.5 = 40%
The ones without nuts that they ate equaled 52% of the box because 50% x 0.5 = 52%
They ate 92% of the box because 40 + 52 = <<40+52=92>>92
They left 8% of the box because 100 - 92 = <<100-92=8>>8
The box had 80 chocolates because 28 / 0.35 = <<28/0.35=80>>80
#### 80

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 52. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
